00011 class ORReadWriteLock
00012 {
00013   public:
00014     ORReadWriteLock() 
00015       { pthread_rwlock_init(&fRWLock, 0); }
00016     ~ORReadWriteLock() 
00017       { pthread_rwlock_destroy(&fRWLock); }
00018 
00019      void readLock()
00020        { pthread_rwlock_rdlock(&fRWLock); }
00021 
00022      void writeLock()
00023        { pthread_rwlock_wrlock(&fRWLock); }
00024 
00025      void unlock()
00026        { pthread_rwlock_unlock(&fRWLock); }
00027
